SQL.LOAD: SELECT workqueue_id, company_id, user_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, workqueue_assign_id FROM elp_workqueue_assign WHERE workqueue_assign_id = :workqueue_assign_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT workqueue_id, company_id, user_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, workqueue_assign_id FROM elp_workqueue_assign WHERE user_id = :user_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_workqueue_assign SET workqueue_id = :workqueue_id, company_id = :company_id, user_id = :user_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE workqueue_assign_id = :workqueue_assign_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_workqueue_assign ( workqueue_id, company_id, user_id, created_by, workqueue_assign_id ) VALUES ( :workqueue_id, :company_id, :user_id, :created_by, :workqueue_assign_id )
